name: Radline
description:
Radline: Quarantine is a co-operative sandbox horde shooter set in a quarantined area infected by unknown virus.

Key fetures:
  • fast-paced online co-op up to 5 players
  • customizable characters, rank system, unlockable items
  • sentry turrets, tesla coils and other fancy zombie-killing stuff
  • traps, barbed fences, barricades, buildable structures



Team up with your friends and survive together!
